title: Introduction
body:
Hello {{_globals._learnerInfo.firstname}} and welcome to our team presentation project. We hope you'll enjoy your time!
First, we are going to share our vision with you
instruction: Click each icon to find out more

_items.title: Connoisseurs & Explorers
_items.body:
Yet, every day we are searching for the “unknown knows.
Through previous experience or self taught, we know what we’re doing, be it e-learning courses, stunning visuals or the subtle art or saying “no”, encompassed with stellar stakeholder management.

_items.title: Akin & Diverse
_items.body:
We don’t challenge for the challenge, we challenge for the goal.
We’re structurally creative and we’re looking at the big picture through the “small pictures”. We speak to people in their language and hear them in ours. We’re early risers and night owls.

_items.title: Agile & Steady mindset
_items.body:
We poker plan but leave poker faces aside.
We have the backlog in the back of our minds and we don’t just go with the waterfall flow. We create straight yellow brick roads from client briefs to finished products.

_items.title: Freethinkers & Believers
_items.body:
We are not brain surgeons but we believe in stretching neurons.
We defy numbness and overcome our fears, we embrace our mistakes and take them with a grain of salt. We believe that the 8 hour work day is not just filled with minutes and seconds but with ideas and play.

title: Meet the team
body: Now that you know what our vision is, it’s time to meet the teem!

title: Aura
body: Senior professional with 12+ years of experience in leading competence development & corporate communication projects in global environments, with a track record of cross-functional and multi-cultural programs. Skilled in mentoring and enabling people in diverse teams, focused on collaborative development. Passion to do the right things and do things right.

title: Alexandra
body:
I am a young, enthusiastic professional in search of discovering new opportunities for career development. I am constantly improving my skills, learning new techniques and tools for creating the best training there is. My belief is that e-learning is the future of education, and I plan to be ready for it when it takes over.

Follow me on LinkedIn or download my Résumé to find out more details on my career path.

title: Alin
body:
Senior professional with 12+ years of experience in leading competence development & corporate communication projects in global environments, with a track record of cross-functional and multi-cultural programs. Skilled in mentoring and enabling people in diverse teams, focused on collaborative development. Passion to do the right things and do things right.

Follow me on LinkedIn or download my Résumé to find out more details on my career path.

title: Dan
body:
What’s up, I’m Cosmin. I’m an Instructional Designer currently living in Bucharest, Romania. I am a fan of technology, design, and programming. I’m also highly interested in entrepreneurship and gaming.

Follow me on LinkedIn or download my Résumé to find out more details on my career path.

title: Cosmin
body:
What’s up, I’m Cosmin. I’m an Instructional Designer currently living in Bucharest, Romania. I am a fan of technology, design, and programming. I’m also highly interested in entrepreneurship and gaming.

You can also check out my portfolio if you want to find out more about my work.
